com.gwtext.client.state
Class CookieProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.gwtext.client.core.JsObject
      com.gwtext.client.state.Provider
          com.gwtext.client.state.CookieProvider

public class CookieProvider
extends Provider

The default Provider implementation which saves state via cookies. Usage : 

 CookieProvider cp = new CookieProvider(...);
 Manager.setProvider(cp);

See Also:
Manager
